mapper.select: SELECT tb.articleNo, tb.parentNo, fnc.level,tb.title,tb.content,tb.imageFileName,tb.writeDate,tb.id FROM (SELECT function_hierarchical() AS articleNO, parentNO, @level AS LEVEL, title, content, imageFileName,writeDate, id FROM (SELECT @start_with:=0,@articleNO:=@start_with, @level:=0) tbl JOIN t_board) fnc left outer join t_board tb ON tb.articleNo = fnc.articleNo
mapper.insert: insert into t_board(articleNO, parentNO, title, content, imageFileName, id) values(#{articleNO}, #{parentNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{imageFileName}, #{id})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE articleNO = #{articleNO} or parentNO = #{parentNO}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO t_imageFile(imageFileNO, imageFileName, articleNO) VALUES
(#{item.imageFileNO}, #{item.imageFileName}, #{item.articleNO})
